Articles.Content:
This game...

...is the most addictive game i've ever played. Seroiusly. Cookie clicker was nothing compared to this. I played it for an hour, then got bored.

But this game...

...has driven me to the point of insanity. Hundreds of hours lost. Countless precious days gobbled up like they never existed.

I still hear it. the constant, soulless scream of the jet engines.

Anyway, i've decided to go cold turkey on KSP. I'm going to take a break from it. I'll see how long i last.
Well obviously, you can't let the game override your life and drive you insane, but going cold turkey? How about you just better manage your time on it and tell yourself to quit when it's time.
I wish I had so much fun with this game. But lately I've been lacking in fun ideas on what to make and do or what story I can make up. I can't find any inspiration for days now...

Well, i decided to play only every second day and not more then 2 hours... works well... and ideas come from all the other things, there is suddenly enough time for. My KSP experience has moved from a somewhat addiction to a conscious and much more fun experience. Try it!
